LORD ELDER watched TUCSON and TALON with their little ones, playing
and getting to know the rest of the group, a small smile playing on
his lips as well.

However LEGACY'S tall and dark form came to stand beside ELDER and he
spoke to him in low indistinct tones.

ELDER nodded, "I know, I know, but we need to wait for for Rodimus and
the others to return first."

"The delay is illogical and could be dangerous." LEGACY said, his
tones betraying a hint of annoyance.

ELDER nodded, "But necessary." There was a small shrug, "They will be
back soon . . . I hope."

There was a slight nod from LEGACY as both he and ELDER watched
TUCSON, TALON and her two children. "Hope is illogical." LEGACY said
coldly.
It does not alter circumstance or probably outcomes."

ELDER sighed as he awaited some news of RODIMUS or the others.

(TAG)

- Preston
